Package com.mapdigit.gis.raster

The packge defines raster digital map related classes.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICustomMapType
    Defines the map types and relations between map types.
    IMapDrawingListener
    map downloading linstener.
    IReaderListener
    Callback when downloading map tiles.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MapClient
    Map Client ,prvoide improved dynamic performance of the raster map.Asynchronized for pan ,zoom in/zoom out.
    MapConfiguration
    map configuration.
    MapTileAbstractReader
    Base class for all map tile downloader/reader/render.
    MapTileDownloader
    MapTileDownloader download map image tiles from server (msn,yahoo,etc).
    MapTileDownloadManager
    map tile download manager.
    MapTiledZone
    Define a tiled map zone.
    MapTileStreamReader
    This class is used to store driving directions results
    MapType
    Defines the map types and relations between map types.
    RasterMap
    RasterMap a map class uses to display raster map.

Package com.mapdigit.gis.raster Description

The packge defines raster digital map related classes.
